data.name: AdKill - Reddit
data.description: Kills the promoted posts in the main flow and hides the adverts in the sidebar. Does nothing else so should be composable with other styles for Reddit.

data.name: @IT(atmarkit.co.jp) article width adjuster
data.description:
@ITの固定幅となっている記事を調整できるようにします。
This script enables the article of @IT(atmarkit.co.jp) whose width is fixed to be adjustable accordingly to the browser width.

data.name: Dueling Nexus - Customizable Background
data.description:
Does exactly what you think, just edit the linked background in the editor to whatever you choose.

!!! Important !!!
An image must be by itself, which can be done by right-clicking an image, then hitting open image in new tab. The URL of the image is what you put into this style.
